<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#0B0B0B">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/topBarOrders" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"> <ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cart" app:tint="#F57C00" android:contentDescription="@null"/> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp"> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvOrdersHeaderTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/orders_header_title" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvOrdersHeaderSubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0 pedidos registrados" android:textColor="#BDBDBD" android:textSize="12sp"/> </LinearLayout> <View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> <ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_dashboard" app:tint="#FFFFFF" android:contentDescription="@null"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Search --> <EditText android:id="@+id/etSearchOrders" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:hint="@string/orders_search_hint" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textColorHint="#AAAAAA" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_bg" android:inputType="text" android:autofillHints="search" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/topBarOrders" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"/>
<!-- Filtros --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/filtersBarOrders" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/etSearchOrders" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"> <Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerStatusFilter" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="40dp" android:backgroundTint="#181818" android:spinnerMode="dropdown" android:popupBackground="#FFFFFF" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:theme="@style/SpinnerWhiteText" android:background="@drawable/bg_spinner_white_border" /> <View android:layout_width="8dp" android:layout_height="0dp" /> <Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerPaymentFilter" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="40dp" android:backgroundTint="#181818" android:spinnerMode="dropdown" android:popupBackground="#FFFFFF" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:theme="@style/SpinnerWhiteText" android:background="@drawable/bg_spinner_white_border" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Orders list --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvOrders" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:padding="4dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/filtersBarOrders" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/bottomNavOrders" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"/>
<!-- Add button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnAddOrder" android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_bg" android:backgroundTint="#F57C00" android:src="@drawable/ic_add" app:tint="#FFFFFF" android:contentDescription="@string/add_order_button_desc" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/bottomNavOrders" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"/>
<!-- Bottom carousel --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/bottomNavOrders" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="72dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"/>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
